products.name: ICTICT618 - Manage IP, ethics and privacy in ICT environments
products.description: Advanced management of intellectual property, ethics and privacy in ICT environments. Includes policy development and compliance frameworks.

products.name: ICTICT615 - Implement system software changes
products.description: Implement and manage system software changes. Includes change management, testing procedures and deployment strategies.

products.name: ICTICT616 - Implement and use a database
products.description: Advanced database implementation and management. Includes database design, optimization and security implementation.

products.name: ICTICT611 - Develop and maintain information security program
products.description: Develop and maintain comprehensive information security programs. Includes risk assessment and security policy implementation.

products.name: ICTICT610 - Manage copyright, ethics and privacy in an ICT environment
products.description: Manage copyright, ethics and privacy in ICT environments. Includes compliance management and policy development.

products.name: ICTICT608 - Interact with clients on a business level
products.description: Advanced client interaction and relationship management. Includes business communication and stakeholder management.

products.name: ICTICT607 - Implement network security infrastructure
products.description: Implement and manage network security infrastructure. Includes security protocols and network protection strategies.

products.name: ICTICT606 - Develop a strategic ICT business continuity plan
products.description: Develop comprehensive ICT business continuity plans. Includes disaster recovery and risk management strategies.

products.name: ICTICT509 - Gather data to identify business requirements
products.description: Learn to gather and analyze data to identify business requirements. Includes data collection methods, analysis techniques and documentation.

products.name: ICTICT511 - Match ICT needs with the strategic direction of the organisation
products.description: Develop skills to align ICT requirements with organizational strategy. Includes strategic planning, needs analysis and resource allocation.
